response.overview: Create a warm, holiday atmosphere in your home with the sights and sounds of Christmas, filmed in high definition. From a cozy, crackling fireplace to colorful light displays, festive Christmas trees, and sparkling snow-covered peaks, you'll enjoy this beautiful scenery accompanied by your favorite Christmas songs performed on a hammered dulcimer, Uilleann Pipes and a new age guitar. Perfect as a background for holiday entertaining, opening presents, or simply relaxing!
response.title: New Age Christmas
